trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around June 25th 2009
Summary: Yellow flash in the sky, sparkly circle.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was hanging out with some of my friends in the park close to my house at around 8p.m. when I looked up into the sky and saw a yellow circle in the sky, there seemed to be almost rings around it, almost as if it were on fire in a way, it's hard to describe because it only lasted a few seconds, then it flashed white and disappeared into the sky. I looked in that direction for another minute telling my friends what I saw, but I didn't see it again. It took me a few days to post this but I was surprised to see that many people close to my area had seen a similar object in the area. Interesting.
